EmailTemplate.name: Notify Data Lake Team to review Client for Data Lake Access
EmailTemplate.subject: New Data Lake Case {!Case.CaseNumber} requires your approval.
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
We have received a case {!Case.CaseNumber} for which they are seeking your approval.
We would request you to please access the case by clicking the link below and provide your approval by marking the sales review field to Yes or No.
Click here
With Regards Data Lake Team.
